resources.string: Find the Character! The character is hiding behind one of those doors. If you found him, your win rate doubles! Withdraw your winnings or keep trying to find him! The amount of doors will increase every time you opening correct door.
You can make a mistake 2 times. You have total 3 lives, by losing third one - game ends, or you will get a chance to play bonus game. Win it and get 1 extra life

You lost, but you have a chance to continue playing. Win the bonus game to get an extra life. The rules of the bonus game are simple. You have 10 seconds to reach the finish line. To move, click as hard as you can
Congratulations! Now you can continue playing or withdraw your reward!
The bonus game! The rules are the same as the rock paper scissors rules. Here you can see the diagram that shows us what beats what. If you win, reward doubles!
